Testimonials.label: Testimonials
Testimonials.title: What our students are saying.
Testimonials.subtitle: Discover how people from all over the world are transforming their lives by learning to program without programming.

reviews.1: TruePowers.org completely changed my way of thinking. Today, I solve giant sudokus and logic puzzles on my way to work. I never imagined enjoying programming this much.
reviews.2: With just €1, I learned how to build a schedule planner for my academy. Now I use it daily, and even my colleagues ask me to automate their tasks.
reviews.3: Thanks to TruePowers.org, I published my first sudoku book on Amazon. I’m already generating passive income from what I learned!
reviews.4: I knew nothing about programming, but in less than a month, I was solving complex problems with logic. Best of all: I did it all from my phone on my commute.
reviews.5: The TruePowers.org community is incredible. Every time I get stuck, a mentor or fellow student helps me. It’s like having a global support team.
reviews.6: The 'program without programming' approach opened my eyes. Now I can communicate with computers using simple rules and solve problems that used to seem like magic.
reviews.7: What I love most about TruePowers.org is that it’s not just a course. It’s a gateway to a new professional world. I'm already helping others as a mentor.
reviews.8: I never thought learning logic could be so addictive. I no longer waste time—I invest it in myself. Thank you, TruePowers, for making this possible.

InfoLanding.title: Empower your logical mind
InfoLanding.description: Discover how easy and fun it can be to learn logic programming from your mobile. At TruePowers.org, you train your mind to solve problems few can tackle.

title.3: Stand out in the digital world

description.1: Enjoy a simple and practical process that lets you learn logic programming with no prior experience.
description.2: Master challenges like impossible sudokus and automated planners using only your phone and simple rules.
description.3: Develop a unique skill that sets you apart in the job market and brings you closer to financial freedom.

Features.title: Explore our features
Features.subtitle: Awaken your logical power with tools designed to help you learn to program without complications.

1.title: Effortless learning
1.description: Learn logic programming step by step from your mobile. Our intuitive platform turns complex concepts into clear and practical exercises.

2.title: AI for solving challenges
2.description: Solve sudokus, puzzles, and planners in seconds thanks to the power of programmed logic. No prior experience needed—just curiosity.

3.title: Real results
3.description: From day one, you’ll see how your skills apply to real problems. Generate practical solutions that even impress professional programmers.

4.title: Creativity powered by logic
4.description: Turn your imagination into logical code. Your creativity is the only limit—from brain game books to automation apps.

5.title: Learn by playing
5.description: Become the hero of your learning journey by solving logic challenges like mental games. Every exercise is a new adventure.

6.title: Immersive and fun experience
6.description: Enjoy learning with a vibrant community, progressive challenges, and mental rewards that hook you from day one.

PricingPageFAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
PricingPageFAQ.label: Pricing
PricingPageFAQ.subtitle: Common questions about our platform and credit system.
qa: TruePowers.org is an educational platform that teaches you to program without programming. Learn computational logic from your phone by solving challenges like giant sudokus, logic puzzles, intelligent planners, and more.
How does the credit system work?
1 Credit = 1 Advanced Exercise. By purchasing credits, you unlock access to practical exercises on the platform. With just €1, you get enough credits to complete the entire course.
What are the prices for credit packages?
We offer plans starting at €1, accessible to anyone in the world. The more credits you purchase, the more exercises you can practice. There are packages for all levels—from beginner to mentor.
Can I customize the challenges I want to solve?
Absolutely! You can choose from a wide variety of challenges: classic, hyper, and Samurai sudokus, complex puzzles, and intelligent planners. You can tailor the experience to your interests.
How fast is the technology used to solve exercises?
TruePowers.org uses optimized computational logic to give you results in seconds. Just enter your rules and click 'Run'. The system does the rest—faster than many programmers!
Do I need previous programming experience?
No. TruePowers.org is designed for absolute beginners. Everything is guided step by step, with explanatory videos and a support community on exercism.org and dev.to.
Can I repeat the same exercise multiple times?
Yes. You can practice the same challenge with different approaches, learn from your mistakes, and improve your logical thinking. Each run strengthens your understanding.
